Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Provides additional tax exemptions for two qualified veterans living in the same household
Summary: Provides additional tax exemptions on qualifying residential real property where two or more qualified veterans live in the same household.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to granting an additional tax exemption for two qualified veterans living in the same household
